review: I love this product, The only thing I have noticed is that it gets super hot. I always shut my power supply strip off for my TV after watching it anyway. But anyone that purchases it my want to make sure it doesn't catch on fire.

review: Overall it works great and was easy to set up. I like broadcasting Chrome from my PC to my TV. My only gripe is that the output is a little delayed.

review: This thing is great! I got it on sale and with 2 day shipping.

review: love this. excellent for watching cable or satellite tv from your laptop. streams nicely, not slow, now buffering. deff would recommend. worth the not so expensive money
